sentences: George Morel (born 20 September 1967 in New York) is a DJ and record producer.
George Morel (born 20 September 1967 in New York) is a DJ and record producer. He is considered "one of the central figures in the early-'90s New York garage/house scene".
His DJ career began in the New York clubs Red Zone, Palladium, Traxs and Save the Robots.
His record producing career started in 1989, when he co-wrote and co-produced Dee Halloway's single "Our Love Is Over" together with David Cole.
In 1990, he co-wrote and co-produced 2 in a Room's single "Wiggle It", reaching number one on the US Billboard Dance Chart.
